bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for the Application of Faulted Circuit Indicators for 200 A, Single-Phase Underground Residential Distribution (URD)
IEEE Guide for the Application of Faulted Circuit Indicators for 200 A, Single-Phase Underground Residential Distribution (URD)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This application guide provides information on what a basic faulted circuit indicator (FCI) is designed to do, and describes methods for selecting FCIs. The application of FCIs to single-phase, 200 A, underground residential distribution (URD) circuits is described.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
